EmailTemplate.description: TFS Support Request Comment Notification sent to customer
EmailTemplate.name: TFS: Support Request Comment
EmailTemplate.subject: Toyota Financial Services Comment - Support Request {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact}:
A response to your {!Case.Service_Request_Subject__c} Support Request has been posted to our Support Center. To access the message, please log in www.ToyotaFinancial.com.
View Message
Please follow these instructions to view your secure message:
- Login to www.ToyotaFinancial.com with your username and password - Select Support Center Inbox link on the left side of the web page - Click on Support Request {!Case.CaseNumber} to see the message
We value your business and look forward to serving your needs. Thank you for visiting us at www.ToyotaFinancial.com.
Sincerely, Toyota Financial Services Customer Support
This is a no reply email notification. Replies initiated from this email will neither be delivered nor answered. If you have additional questions, please log in to the Support Center for further assistance.
